message: You mean like Clue or Warhammer?
I mean like any kind of board/tabletop game!
I'm pretty into board games too
I think I'm part of at least 3 board game night groups IRL
I love me some scrabble but I am really competitive. Oh and CatchPhrase is a great game and one of my favs, always a good time and good laughs
I like scrabble too, though words with friends has taught me I suck at it!
And trivial pursuit!! With 1980s genus edition cards. The new ones are kind of too easy.
Nice. I'm trying to get one started around me, and we're holding a board game day in May to fundraise for our Autism walk. Even got a bunch of game companies to donate games!
Must try carcassonne too. I think my brother is into it now too.
My wife and I are big fans of Carc. We even have Kids of Carcassonne to play with the kids.
trivial pursuit is deadly for me and my family around Christmas and thanksgiving
My family, on occasion, will play Pictionary...but instead of drawing, we act it out (like charades). Hilarity ensues.
Does words with friends count? Though, I think @rkalajian gave up playing against me.

I watched a an evening of Wizard and found it extraordinary, a card game sorta the flavor of Texas Hold'em though quite different and skill is much more important than luck. The custom deck is probably worth what it costs, but there is a free varient is called "Oh Hell" which uses two decks and all the jokers. Humm, looks like there is online version of Wizard too. http://www.wizardcards.com/  Rules for Wizard and Oh Hell are in wikipedia and other sites...
@phntm42 I just haven't loaded it up in a while :)
